description: React component for the Quiz page, handling quiz display, answer selection, grading, and UI interactions based on quiz data and user context.

methods.name: Quiz()
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the quiz interface, managing answers, submission, and scoring.

methods.name: grade
methods.description: Calculates the number of correct answers and percentage score based on current answers.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Updates answer state when user selects a quiz option.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles quiz submission, validates answers, computes result, and updates state.

methods.name: retry
methods.description: Resets answers and score to allow user to retake the quiz.
